    function loadCSS(href, before, media) {
      var ss = window.document.createElement("link");
      var ref = before || window.document.getElementsByTagName("meta")[0];
      var sheets = window.document.styleSheets;
      ss.rel = "stylesheet";
      ss.href = href.trim();
      ss.media = "only x";
      ref.parentNode.appendChild(ss, ref);
      function toggleMedia() {
        var defined;
        for (var i = 0; i < sheets.length; i++) {
          if (sheets[i].href && sheets[i].href.indexOf(href.trim().substr(-8)) > -1) {
            defined = true;
          }
        }
        if (defined) {
          ss.media = media || "all";
        }
        else {
          setTimeout(toggleMedia);
        }
      }

      toggleMedia();
      return ss;
    }

    window.loadCSS = loadCSS;
    </script><script>
    function loadJs(src) {
      var ref = window.document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0];
      var script = window.document.createElement("script");
      script.src = src;
      script.defer = 1;
      ref.parentNode.insertBefore(script, ref);
      return script;
    }
    window.loadJs = loadJs
    </script><script>
    function whenAvailable(name, callback, ms) {
      const interval = ms ? ms : 15; // ms
      var timeout = window.setTimeout(function () {
        if (window[name]) {
          window.clearTimeout(timeout);
          callback(window[name]);
        } else {
          window.setTimeout(arguments.callee, interval);
        }
      }, interval);
    }
    window.whenAvailable = whenAvailable;

  (function() {
    window.googletag = window.googletag || { cmd: [] };

    function getCurrentUser(endpointURL, encryptedDocumentKey = '') {
      const options = {
        timeout: 3000,
        cache: 'no-cache',
        credentials: 'include',
        headers: {
          'X-ENCRYPTED-DOCUMENT-KEY': encryptedDocumentKey,
          // the following headers are necessary for the cxense dynamic paywall logic
          // which helps determine whether a user should see an article or not
          'x-original-host': window.location.host,
          'x-original-url': window.location.pathname + window.location.search + window.location.hash,
        },
      };
      return fetch(endpointURL, options).then((response) => response.json());
    }

    /**
     * Make a request to get the entitlements of the current user
     */
    function requestEntitlements() {
      performance.mark('ads-request-entitlements');
      // Get entitilements (user data)
      const queryParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
      const isSnippetView = 'true' === 'true';
      window.__isSnippetView = isSnippetView;

      const targeting = {
        alert: "volatility050,red,0.5330206392711848",
        msrc: queryParams.get('mod') || '',
        application_stack: "gcn",
        breakpoint: "at16units",
        page: "article",
      };

      if(isSnippetView) {
        const userTargeting = {
          circ: 'nonsubscriber',
          // AdTech renamed circ to usertype in data layer
          usertype: 'nonsubscriber'
        };

        window.utag_data.profiles = {
          propensity: '',
        };
        window.utag_data.user_exp = 'default';
        window.utag_data.user_ref = '';
        window.utag_data.user_tags = '';
        window.utag_data.user_type = 'nonsubscriber';
        window.utag_data.article_template = 'preview';

        try {
          window.__ace('dataLayer', 'setData',[{...targeting, ...userTargeting}]);
        } catch(e) {}
      }

      // saving entitlements fetch promise in global object
      const entitlementsUrl = 'https://www.wsj.com/client';
      const encryptedDocumentKey = 'FQexrX4odnc5b2P3mEqtUDcLXRtRBpkg18ChowYVUVDW2ZgdqCtIctQeaQGTpqOdzkhE14Q2gp8dBuKnUXRKaDWFDWOPiBVCxLy2iB7cfK6KMB6kPdo5Fzdso50YbJZihT2zBIeS3PNEh+6umLXnhRU6+8f5w0yt/y4v/wSAAQvXdYO0KAc2j5emh/Lj9GR/rB6AfLWmKz8oS9z2iwsidAxLNm0JWDA3B4F0Ckf4Lha/+99MlZ3Q0uzzSEPbgw==';
      window.entitlementsAsyncData = getCurrentUser(entitlementsUrl, encryptedDocumentKey);

      window.entitlementsAsyncData
        .then((retrievedUser = {}) => {
          performance.mark('ads-receive-entitlements');

          if (retrievedUser.redirect) {
            window.location.href = retrievedUser.redirect;
            return;
          }

          const {
            companyDetails: { company_codes: companyCodes, name: companyName = '' } = {},
            documentKey,
            execEdition,
            experience,
            facebookSub,
            tags,
            type,
            vxid,
            paywall,
            permissions: { wsjPausedSub } = {},
            profiles: { propensity } = {},
          } = retrievedUser || {};

          window.utag_data.cx_shield = paywall;

          if(!isSnippetView) {
            const userTargeting = {
              circ: type,
              // AdTech renamed circ to usertype in data layer
              usertype: type
            };

            window.utag_data.profiles = {
              propensity: propensity || '',
            };
            window.utag_data.user_exp = experience || '';
            window.utag_data.user_ref = (vxid && `V2-${vxid}`) || '';
            window.utag_data.user_tags = (tags && tags.join) ? tags.join(',') : '';
            window.utag_data.user_type = type || '';
            window.utag_data.article_template = !documentKey ? 'preview' : 'full';

            if (wsjPausedSub) {
              window.utag_data.sub_paused = 'true';
            }

            if (facebookSub) {
              window.utag_data.fbSub = 'true';
            }

            if (execEdition) {
              const companyId = companyCodes?.join('|') || '';

              window.utag_data.company_id = companyId;
              window.utag_data.company_name = companyName;
              window.utag_data.page_site = 'WSJ Executive';
              window.utag_data.page_site_product = 'WSJEXEC';
            }

            try {
              window.__ace('dataLayer', 'setData',[{...targeting, ...userTargeting}]);
            } catch(e) {}
          }
        })
        .catch((error) => console.error(error));
    }

    // First, get the entitlements
    requestEntitlements();
  })();

readabilityObject.title: Covid-19 Is Resurging, and This Time Itâ€™s Everywhere
readabilityObject.content:
Updated Nov. 16, 2020 3:54 am ET

With a third surge of the Covid-19 pandemic hitting the U.S., many public-health authorities are warning the coronavirus is now so widespread that it will take pervasive new measures to contain it.

New infections surpassed 177,224 on Friday, setting a daily record that eclipsed the highest daily case counts of previous peaks in the spring and summer. The number of new infections was lower Saturday at 166,555, while new deaths numbered nearly 1,300, according to data compiled by Johns Hopkins University. The number of people hospitalized with Covid-19, meanwhile, reached 69,455 on Saturday, according to the Covid Tracking Project.

The number of new infections was lower Saturday at 166,555, while new deaths numbered nearly 1,300, according to data compiled by Johns Hopkins University. The number of people hospitalized with Covid-19, meanwhile, reached 69,455 on Saturday, according to the Covid Tracking Project.
readabilityObject.excerpt: The pervasive spread in smaller communities has fueled a nationwide case record, though mortality rates are lower than in the spring.
